title: DemoToday
abstract: Demo meetup just to show off the "today" feature of meetup.mu

title: Kubernetes Bootcamp
abstract: Are you ready to learn Kubernetes, the leading container orchestration platform? Join our Kubernetes Bootcamp and dive deep into containerization, Kubernetes architecture, deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. Through a hands-on lab, you'll gain practical experience with essential tools like kubectl and Helm. This bootcamp is perfect for developers, DevOps engineers, and IT professionals eager to enhance their cloud-native application management skills. By the end, you'll be proficient in deploying, managing, and scaling applications in a Kubernetes environment.

title: Cloud Native Mauritius August Meetup
abstract:
Join us on Saturday, the 31st of August for Cloud Native goodness. The theme for this meetup is "The Basics of Cloud Native" and we are happy to be hosting 3 speakers who will present on a variety of topics!

Dockerising a Wordpress Application - Chittesh Sham
Kubernetes Decomposed - Alex Bissessur
Cloud Native for the Monolith User - Ish Sookun

We're looking forward to having you with us for this event!

title: Cloud Native Strategies for Mauritian Businesses
abstract: This panel discussion explores the transformative power of cloud-native strategies in driving digital business success. Experts will delve into how adopting cloud-native approaches accelerates development cycles, enhances scalability, and fosters innovation. Key topics include leveraging microservices, containers, and serverless architectures to optimize performance and reduce time-to-market. The discussion will also highlight automation tools and practices that streamline operations, improve efficiency, and support continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD). Attendees will gain insights into best practices and real-world applications, empowering them to navigate the complexities of digital transformation with agility and precision.

title: Quantity over Quality: A Kubernetes Tale
abstract: This session aims at casting some light on the massive complex framework that is Kubernetes, so that you too can shout "btw i use kubernetes" with pride. You will finally understand the technical jargon surrounding Kubernetes, as well as how each component works together seamlessly when deploying applications. After this session, you will be well equipped to embark on a Kubernetes-related adventure of your own, be it as a developer of system administrator.

title: Achieving Zero downtime Deployment in Banking Applications
abstract: Embark on a journey of insights as the process of implementing zerodowntime deployment in the dynamic realm of banking applications is discussed. With millions of logins daily, substantial challenges were encountered, but commensurate rewards were achieved. In this session, the adoption of Kubernetes will be explored, playing a pivotal role in the quest for seamless deployment. Experiences will be shared, delving into the hurdles faced, and lessons learned from several failed attempts that ultimately led to success. Through a real-world case study, the transformative impact on the work-life balance of software engineers and the substantial improvement in customer experience for millions of users will be showcased. The approach taken will be detailed, illustrating how maintenance and bug fixes during peak usage were facilitated, while also elevating overall system resilience.

title: Cloud Native with MSCC
location: MCB Building, St. Jean Roundabout, Q. Bornes

title: Cloud Native Mauritius March Meetup
abstract:
Join us on Saturday, the 1st of March for Cloud Native goodness. The theme for this meetup is "Cloud Native Experiences" and we are happy to be hosting 3 speakers who will present on a variety of topics!

* From Chaos to Containers: Automating Your Docker Infrastructure with Ansible - Kherin Bundhoo
* Docker Swarm vs K3s for Small Businesses - Bruno Bernard
* Understanding Container Runtimes - Ish Sookun

We're looking forward to having you with us for this event!

title: Cloud Native Mauritius February Meetup
abstract: Meet us at Flying Dodo Bagatelle for a chill talk around Cloud Native. Get to meet the community and discover new things in tech.

title: Cloud Native Mauritius x MSCC Collab
